Text:
You are Welcome!
Some days ago i was checking all my torrents that i have uploaded here and on most of my torrents i saw your comments that you encouraged me and that time was a very beautiful time for me when i was reading those comments.
May the Shower Of Mercy And Blessing Of Allah Be Upon You!. 
Thanks For Everything (^_^)
Thank you, so precious to us...Keep up!

Thank you, and please continue your good work.

And when you receive hate and lies from the hateful and stupid, feel proud as it is proof that what you are doing is good and correct. Only the ignorant hate and fear knowledge.
Inshallah, I will do as you said :)
thanks bro keep up the good work
